exceptions.tactic: intros E l H x Hx.
intros E' l H x Hx.
intros E' l' H x Hx.

exceptions.exn: In environment E : Rbar -> Prop l : R H : forall x : Rbar, E x -> match x with | Finite y => l <= y | p_infty => True | m_infty => False end y : R Hy : E (- y) Unable to unify "l <= - y" with "y <= - l".
The reference Hx was not found in the current environment.

In environment E : Rbar -> Prop l : R H : forall x : Rbar, E x -> match x with | Finite y => l <= y | p_infty => True | m_infty => False end y : R Hy : E (- y) Unable to unify "E (- y)" with "y² <= (- l)²".

original: intros E l H x Hx. unfold is_upper_bound. intros y Hy. unfold Rbar_is_lower_bound in H. unfold is_upper_bound in Hx. unfold Rbar_opp in Hx. apply H with (x := - y). apply Hx. apply Hy.
